data.eml:eml: Eugnamptine weevils of La Selva, Costa Rica (Coleoptera: Rhynchitidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hamilton, R. W., Novinger, A. L. (2004): Eugnamptine weevils of La Selva, Costa Rica (Coleoptera: Rhynchitidae). Zootaxa 610: 1-43, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158302
